attributes.action: Referendum on whether to continue the ‘lockdown’ system in response to Covid.
attributes.additional_details: The people deserve a choice on the matter. The economy and livelihoods of many have or will be destroyed. There is a risk of increased mortality amongst the vulnerable in society, we can continue to shield and protect those most at risk.
attributes.background: Have a vote on whether Covid restrictions should continue or we accept the risk and return society to normal without enforced restrictions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
